title: Das Ehepaar und die Käserei
translation: The married couple lives in loneliness in the village. One day, they see an innovation in town: there is a new cheese factory. They review their life and decide to work along there. In the cheese factory, they drink herbal tea and meet a hiker. The hiker tells how he always goes back to the cheese factory. While hiking, he listens to music with his headphones. The couple likes the innovation and is no longer lonely.
